mapper.sql: dict_info_id, dict_type_id, dict_info, creat_time, update_time, state, remark
mapper.insert: insert into dict_info (dict_info_id, dict_type_id, dict_info, creat_time, update_time, state, remark) values (#{dictInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dictTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dictInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into dict_info
dict_info_id,
dict_type_id,
dict_info,
creat_time,
update_time,
state,
remark,

mapper.update:
update dict_info
dict_type_id = #{dictTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dict_info = #{dictInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where dict_info_id = #{dictInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update dict_info set dict_type_id = #{dictTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dict_info = #{dictInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where dict_info_id = #{dictInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select dict_info_id from dict_info where dict_type_id = #{dictTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} limit 1;

select count(dict_info_id) from dict_info di left join dict_type dt on di.dict_type_id = dt.dict_type_id
di.dict_type_id like concat('%',#{dictTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},'%')
dict_info like concat('%',#{dictInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
dict_code = #{dictCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
